name: Curse Hand
description:
Curse Hand is a fast-paced first person shooter where you must survive the attacks of the guardians of the forest, collect all the crystals you can to please te gods and become stronger.

Why is it unfinished?

  • To begin with, all the assets were WIP and in the end they ended up remaining in the game, as well all the sound effects...but I'm not going to lie it has an atmosphere and despite the fact that the rays that you shoot from your hands are only a png it has its charm, at least for me.
  • In addition, some of the game mechanics cause me some trouble to figure out, but in the end I decided to stop worring for everything and even i give it an ending after collecting an amount of crystals (before it was going to be endless)
  • It's not well optimized, it is my second attempt with godot in 3d and I still have many things to learn but the game is quite stable.
  • Bugs

Why launch it?

because it was a shame that it only remained on my computer, even though I could not do everything I wanted to do, it has its value that more people play it.

that is all enjoy the game :)

Controls:

move: WASD

shoot: LEFT MOUSE

magic attack: RIGHT MOUSE
